entry.title: Introducing Buncha Nerds
entry.content:
Buncha Nerds is a new tech blog from a bunch who just like to do cool projects.

Poole is the butler for Jekyll, the static site generator. Itâ€™s designed and developed by @mdo to provide a clear and concise foundational setup for any Jekyll site. It does so by furnishing a full vanilla Jekyll install with example templates, pages, posts, and styles.

There are currently two themes built on Poole:

  • Hyde
  • Lanyon

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

What we do

Poole is a streamlined Jekyll site designed and built as a foundation for building more meaningful themes. Poole, and every theme built on it, includes the following:

Who we are

Poole and its themes are by preference a forward-thinking project. In addition to the latest versions of Chrome, Safari (mobile and desktop), and Firefox, it is only compatible with Internet Explorer 9 and above.
